ps.ptxt: Shift solenoid valve No.1 and/or No.2 circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Pressure control solenoid valve circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Output shaft speed sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Input shaft speed sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Transmission fluid temperature sensor circuit faulty

action.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.
Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent. If NG, repair.

ps.ptxt: Accelerator pedal position sensor circuit faulty

paragroup.ptxt: Inspect circuit for open, short and intermittent.

For J20A model, refer to DTC P0122: Throttle Position Sensor (Main) Circuit Low:M16A and J20A , DTC P0123: Throttle Position Sensor (Main) Circuit High:M16A and J20A , DTC P0222: Throttle Position Sensor (Sub) Circuit Low:M16A and J20A and DTC P0223: Throttle Position Sensor (Sub) Circuit High:M16A and J20A .
For J24B model, refer to DTC P0122 / P0123:J24B , DTC P0222 / P0223:J24B .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
